PERIPHERALS.NAME: Real-time Clock
PERIPHERALS.DESCRIPTION: PT1000 temperature sensor built within industrial pH sensor.

PERIPHERALS.NAME: Bluetooth module
PERIPHERALS.DESCRIPTION: PT1000 temperature sensor built within industrial pH sensor.

CONTROL.name: QUEUE UPLOAD INTERVAL
CONTROL.description: This interval decides how often the GatorByte attempts uploading queue files that failed to upload previously.

CONTROL.name: WLEV SAMPLING INTERVAL
CONTROL.description: This interval determines how often the water level is read by the GatorByte.

CONTROL.name: END TIP CONT THRESHOLD
CONTROL.description: This is the number of tips it takes to end the previous treatment cycle after a dry period or during the (previous) treatment cycle.

CONTROL.name: MIN TIP CONT THRESHOLD
CONTROL.description: This is the number of tips it takes to mark the start of a new treatment cycle.

CONTROL.name: RESET VARIABLES FLAG
CONTROL.description: This will reset the RAINID, HOURID, and other state variables.

CONTROL.name: REBOOT FLAG
CONTROL.description: This will reboot the GatorByte. The GatorByte resumes at the state it was prior to rebooting.

CONTROL.name: INTER TIP TIMEOUT
CONTROL.description: This is how far a new tip needs to happen to be considered a new rain event. This will reset the tip counter.

CONTROL.name: HOMOGENIZATION DELAY
CONTROL.description: This is how long the water in the body takes to homogenize after the end of the rain (last tip).

CONTROL.name: INTER SAMPLE DURATION
CONTROL.description: Once the treatment cycle begins, this variables determines the duration between each sample.

CONTROL.name: CV UPLOAD INTERVAL
CONTROL.description: This determines how often the GatorByte uploads the control variables to the dashboard.

CONTROL.name: ANTIFREEZE REBOOT DELAY
CONTROL.description: GatorByte may freeze up after a few days of continuos operation. At the end of this timeout, the GatorByte resets automatically, preventing freezes preemptively.
